name: powder
effect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
short_effect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.

flavor_text.x_y: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.
